## ApiReturnTypeMixin.returnTypeExcerpt property

An [Excerpt](./api-extractor-model.excerpt.md) that describes the type of the function's return value.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly returnTypeExcerpt: Excerpt;
```
